mapper.select: SELECT prodct_seq , main_img , prodct_nme , sel_pric , discnt_pric AS sale_pric , prodct_type , catgr_seq , packg_seq , sel_strt_time , schedl_seq FROM all_sel_prodct_view WHERE prodct_nme LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{prodctSechText} ,'%');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_bridg_tb (cart_bridg_seq , prodct_seq , amont , custmr_seq) VALUE((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(cb.cart_bridg_seq),0) + 1 AS cart_bridg_seq FROM cart_bridg_tb as cb) , #{prodctSeq} , #{prodctAmont} , #{cusSeq})

INSERT INTO packg_bridg_cart_tb (packg_bridg_cart_seq , PACKG_SEQ , amont , custmr_seq) VALUE((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(pbc.packg_bridg_cart_seq),0) + 1 AS packg_bridg_cart_seq FROM packg_bridg_cart_tb as pbc) , #{packgSeq} , #{prodctAmont} , #{cusSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT prodct_seq , main_img , detl_img1 , detl_img2 , detl_img3 , prodct_nme , sel_pric , discnt_pric AS sale_pric , prodct_type , sel_strt_time , sel_end_time FROM all_sel_prodct_view WHERE prodct_seq = ${prodctSeq};

SELECT asp1.prodct_seq AS reltnProdctOneSeq , asp1.main_img AS reltnProdctOneImg , asp1.prodct_nme AS reltnProdctOneNme , asp1.sel_pric AS reltnProdctOneSelPric , asp1.discnt_pric AS reltnProdctOneDiscntPric , asp2.prodct_seq AS reltnProdctTwoSeq , asp2.main_img AS reltnProdctTwoImg , asp2.prodct_nme AS reltnProdctTwoNme , asp2.sel_pric AS reltnProdctTwoSelPric , asp2.discnt_pric AS reltnProdctTwoDiscntPric , asp3.prodct_seq AS reltnProdctThreeSeq , asp3.main_img AS reltnProdctThreeImg , asp3.prodct_nme AS reltnProdctThreeNme , asp3.sel_pric AS reltnProdctThreeSelPric , asp3.discnt_pric AS reltnProdctThreeDiscntPric FROM reltn_prodct_tb rp LEFT JOIN all_sel_prodct_view asp1 ON rp.reltn_prodct_seq1 = asp1.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN all_sel_prodct_view asp2 ON rp.reltn_prodct_seq2 = asp2.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN all_sel_prodct_view asp3 ON rp.reltn_prodct_seq3 = asp3.prodct_seq WHERE rp.prodct_seq = ${prodctSeq};
